channel.title: Applicative Hazards
channel.description: Stories on functional programming and the real world

item.title: Pun Hazards
item.description:
Welcome!

This is my personal blog on functional programming and its applications to graphics, physics and distributive computing. There may be occasional posts on logic + math, and hopefully not too many rants.

I couldn’t find a rigid designator for it so I’m going with the lazy pun instead.
item.dc:creator: Călin Ardelean
